DBA with 4 years of extensive experience in designing testing and supporting nextgeneration database solutions in Oracle Enterprise and SQL Server environments Manage Oracle Database Administration assignments for diverse industry clients Enhance database performance perform restores implement recovery procedures handle performance tuning and conduct regular system backups Ensure technical and functional designs meet business requirements Proficient in an assortment of technologies including Oracle 9i10g 11g Flexible in various platforms such as HPUX Red Hat Linux Experienced in real time data replication Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Oracle Database Administrator Constellation INC Laurel MD August 2014 to Present Installed and Configured Grid monitoring tool for Oracle 10g Database Installed configured and manage 10g and 11g ASM storage Performed Dataguard switchover as required for maintenance Work with users to resolve any databasequery performance issues using database advisors and AWRASH reports Work with users to troubleshoot and resolve errors and performance problems with queries and databases Perform restorerecoveryrefresh of databases both on same and alternate servers and other levels of restorerecovery dropped table using data pump Apply oracle patches for various Oracle bugs and quarterly security patches to both primary and standby databases BackupRestore of databasestablesschema using Datapump exportimport and transportable tablespaces Implemented different Partition methodologies to improve performance and manageability Control database resource access through user profiles and data access control through Virtual Private Database and principle of least privileges implementation Ensure that standby database is always in sync with production database by checking archivelogs sequences Perform hot and cold backup using RMAN Troubleshoot and resolve locking and concurrency issues excessive parsing resource bottlenecks including memory and CPU bottlenecks and recommending a solution Oracle Database Administrator General Nutrition Corporation GNC Greenbelt MD January 2011 to August 2014 Established a backup and recovery strategy using daily hot backups RMAN and weekly full backup Ensured daily RMAN backups were completed and valid for restore and recovery Configured the necessary parameters for Flashback database settings and Flash Recovery Area then used RMAN to issue Flash Recovery Commands Performance tuning using AWR ADDM SQL Trace and Tkprof Performed data migration using applications and back end reporting Monitored trace files and log files for errors and database corruption Maintained database configurations in compliance with release management and change management Resolved various application failures due to data entry errors or system errors Provided 24x7 remote support and on call Database support for Database developers endusers Additional
